Definition: Minimum RE share in electricity supply. Set as 0 by default.
Maximum RE share in electricity supply. Left blank by default.
RE target to meet share of electricity demand by  given year.
Percentage of transmission losses in given year.
Set to 1 for RE techs and zero for the others. Backstop is included to avoid infeasibilities in the case where there are not enough technology options to meet the target.
set to -x for the transmission technology, where x is the RE target share (by energy),
